derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, named after Jan Bode von Stapel (died 1636), Dutch botanist

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Stapelia having succulent leafless toothed stems resembling cacti and large evil-smelling (often star-shaped) flowers

auth_sentence.content: Interesting facts Some arums, stapelia and the largest flower in the world - the rafflesia - smell like rotting meat!
auth_sentence.res_content: Interesting facts Some arums, stapelia and the largest flower in the world - the rafflesia - smell like rotting meat!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Interesting facts Some arums, stapelia and the largest flower in the world - the rafflesia - smell like rotting meat!
